meanings.definition: A type of flat Italian bread, typically seasoned with olive oil and herbs.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a warm slice of focaccia with my soup.
meanings.sent2: The bakery down the street sells delicious focaccia.
meanings.sent3: Why did the focaccia go to the party? For the breadsticks!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked focaccia filled the kitchen like a comforting hug.
meanings.sent5: The golden crust of the focaccia glistened under the kitchen lights.

meanings.definition: To bake or make focaccia bread.
meanings.sent1: I will focaccia a batch of bread for the picnic.
meanings.sent2: She loves to focaccia bread on lazy Sundays.
meanings.sent3: When in doubt, just focaccia some bread and everything will be fine.
meanings.sent4: His passion for baking led him to focaccia the most delicious bread in town.
meanings.sent5: The baker decided to focaccia a special loaf for the holiday season.
